article.Heading: Union Budget 2017-2018 Review: Maximus Securities

article.Body:
GDP for Budget Estimate (BE) 2017-2018 has been projected at Rs 1,68,47,455 crore assuming 11.75% growth over the Revised Estimates (RE) of 2016-2017 (Rs 1,50,75,429 crore).

Fiscal deficit for 2017-18 is targeted at 3.2% of GDP and the Government remains committed to achieve 3% in the following year.

In RE (2016-17), the total expenditure at Rs 20,14,407 crore is more than the BE (2016-17) by Rs 36,347 crore. Accordingly, the Fiscal Deficit target of 3.5% in 2016-2017 has been achieved without reduction in expenditure at the RE stage.

Allocation for Capital expenditure has been stepped up by 25.4% over the previous year.
